Title: Cash
Description: The payment is made in cash, such as banknotes and coins.

Title: Check
Description: The payment is made by check (also written as "cheque").

Title: Credit card
Description: The payment is made by credit card.

Title: Direct debit
Description: The payment is made by direct debit, also known as direct withdrawal, pre-authorized debit (PAD) or pre-authorized payment (PAP).

Title: Letter of credit
Description: The payment is made by letter of credit.

Title: Wire transfer
Description: The payment is made by wire transfer, also known as bank transfer or credit transfer.
